Navalny's spokeswoman says Russian authorities give mother 3-hour ultimatum over burialA spokeswoman for the late Alexei Navalny said on Friday that Russian authorities had told his mother he would be buried in the penal colony where he died unless she agreed within three hours to lay him to rest without a public funeral. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:54:10 GMT IW7HF4VLVFNVLLCBJGCP52Z5RE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalnys-spokeswoman-says-Russian-authorities-give-mother-3-hour-ultimatum-over-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Blinken meets Argentina's Milei in latest sign of US supportArgentina's libertarian leader Javier Milei on Friday hosted U.S. top diplomat Antony Blinken, the most senior U.S. official to visit Argentina since Milei was sworn in December pledging a "shock therapy" to stabilize the country's embattled economy. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:48:00 GMT UI3ZKSZQMFJJ7JDUYDU4AUBOXY https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-meets-argentinas-milei-latest-sign-us-support-2024-02-23/Reuters世界
Spanish ex-politician blames Iran for attack in which was shotA Spanish former politician who survived a shooting attack said on Friday he believed Iran's government had hired hitmen to assassinate him over his links to an Iranian dissident group Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:25:26 GMT EI2QQU3LZZIORDMF5BQVN37VFE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spanish-ex-politician-blames-iran-attack-which-was-shot-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Czechs line up Canada, Denmark, others to fund ammunition supplies for UkraineThe Czech Republic has backing from Canada, Denmark and others to help finance a fast purchase of hundreds of thousands of ammunition rounds from third countries to send to Ukraine, the Czech Defence Ministry said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:22:55 GMT NFLV7VJ5RFOA3LIGMORBP25NQU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/czechs-line-up-canada-denmark-others-fund-ammunition-supplies-ukraine-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Moldovan president welcomes US sanctions on pro-Russian party memberMoldovan President Maia Sandu on Friday welcomed new U.S. sanctions on pro-Russian Shor party member Marina Tauber, accusing her of trying to undermine the democracy. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:16:40 GMT SJBHAO762NKY3KWL3LYU7ZBU2M https://www.reuters.com/world/moldovan-president-welcomes-us-sanctions-pro- Russian-party-member-2024-02-23/Reuters世界
Netherlands to sign 10-year security pact with UkraineThe Netherlands said on Friday it will sign a 10-year security deal with Ukraine for continued military support, help in reconstruction and the improvement of its cyberdefences. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 15:06:46 GMT 52IIP7H2NJKDXC5VNZHQFRBCAU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/netherlands-sign-10-year-security-pact-with-ukraine-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Five migrants die as boat capsizes during rescue off MaltaFive migrants, including a woman, died when their boat capsized as they were being rescued off Malta on Friday, the island’s armed forces said. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:47:51 GMT KZTVFJOHDJPEBDYEEL2GFNCKDI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Five-migrants-die-boat-capsizes-during-rescue-off-malta-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
U.N. rights chief deplores 'entrenched impunity' in Israel-Hamas warThe United Nations human rights chief said on Friday that perpetrators of gross human rights violations in the conflict between Israel and Hamas must be held accountable. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:43:38 GMT YOEXUVVJTBORRCANMDRJ62XL6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-rights-chief-deplores-entrenched-impunity-israel-hamas-war-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中东
Key parts of sweeping US sanctions against RussiaThe U.S. on Friday issued sweeping sanctions against Russia over the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny and to mark the second anniversary of the invasion of Ukraine, targeting more than 500 people and entities as Washington seeks to increase pressure on Moscow. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:27:07 GMT OJCXGXZNAVMXJLUDURSWU4AKPE https://www.reuters.com/world/key-parts-sweeping-us-sanctions-against-Russia-2024-02-23/Daphne Psaledakis, David Brunnstrom世界
US targets dozens of entities from China, UAE and Turkey for helping RussiaThe Biden administration said on Friday it has imposed new trade restrictions on 93 entities from Russia, China, Turkey, the United Arab Emirates, Kyrgyzstan, India and South Korea for supporting Russia's war effort in Ukraine. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:18:39 GMT QEYKI7ABTVICTGHM4AGNISHZNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us-places-export-restrictions-93-entities- Russia-china-uae-turkey-others-2024-02-23/Karen Freifeld, Susan Heavey世界
Ukraine probing over 122,000 suspected war crimes, says prosecutorUkraine has launched investigations into more than 122,000 suspected cases of war crimes since the beginning of Russia's full-scale invasion nearly two years ago, Ukrainian Prosecutor General Andriy Kostin said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:13:02 GMT JUEP7ZBXK5OA7PZZ5HJW5SL7IE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-probing-over-122000-suspected-war-crimes-says-prosecutor-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
